content: row knit once into that stitch dropping the extra wrap creating an elongated stitch this is not increasing the number of stitches do not wrap the yarn around the needle two times before knitting the stitch that is a double yarn over and will create large holes in your work and increase the number of stitches instructions set-up row cast on 5sts row 1 rs k2tog k1 yo k1 yo k1 6sts row 2 ws knit row 3 k2tog k2 yo k1 yo k1 7sts row 4 knit row 5 k2tog k3 yo k1 yo k1 8sts row 6 knit notes  one stitch is increased on every right side row until you get to the border to keep track of your stitch count just increase your number by one on every odd numbered row  work the sand stitch eyelet row lace and drop stitch sections in that order two times and the sand stitch section one more time finish with the border sand stitch section repeat sand stitch pattern below 3 times 24 row total row 1 pb check special abbreviation and techniques for explanation k2tog k to last 2sts yo k1 yo k1 remember if you are not using beads just skip over the pb in the instructions row 2 k4 p1 k1 repeat to last stitch p1 row 3 k2tog k to last 2sts yo k1 yo k1 row 4 k4 k1 p1 repeat to end row 5 pb k2tog k to last 2sts yo k1 yo k1 row 6 k4 p1 k1 repeat to last stitch p1 row 7 k2tog k to last 2sts yo k1 yo k1 row 8 k4 k1 p1 repeat to end eyelet row section repeat eyelet row pattern below 6 times 36 row total row 1 pb k2tog k to last 2sts yo k1 yo k1 row 2 k4 p to end row 3 k2tog k2 yo k2tog k4 repeat to last 2sts yo k1 yo k1 you will not be able to complete the yo k2tog k4 on most row before the last 2sts row 4 k4 p to end row 5 k2tog k to last 2sts yo k1 yo k1 row 6 knit lace section repeat lace pattern below 3 times 24 row total row 1 pb k2tog yo k2tog repeat to last 2sts yo k1 yo k1 row 2 k4 p to end row 3 k2tog yo k2tog repeat to last 3sts k1 yo k1 yo k1 row 4 k4 p to end row 5 k2tog k1 yo k2tog repeat to last 3sts k1 yo k1 yo k1 row 6 k4 p to end row 7 k2tog k1 yo k2tog repeat to last 2sts yo k1 yo k1 row 8 k4 p to end drop stitch section check special abbreviation and techniques for explanation repeat drop stitch pattern below 3 times 24 row total row 1 pb k2tog k to last 2sts yo k1 yo k1 row 2 k4 p to end row 3 k2tog k to
